name: Hidden Object Adventure Game
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

A great Hidden Object game for kids! With 3 worlds, there is allot of levels. A fun and addictive app for the kids! 3 modes of hints if you get stuck Try to score the Highest score!

Features
- Beautiful high-quality images
- Addictive gameplay
- Catchy sound effects and music!
- Differences randomized on each play
- 3 modes of hints if you get stuck
- Fun for kids 3+
